ew-extension.name: ScrollingTable
ew-extension.author: e.World
ew-extension.description:
Scrolling table example
Notes: 1. This extension serves as an additional example of using template extension for registered users only. This extensions is NOT part of PHPMaker, NO technical support will be provided. 2. Latest version of browsers are required. If IE, IE >= 8 is required, IE <=7 are not supported.
